div.p: This project allows to open and work with maven projects in the Netbeans IDE. Mevenide currently supports NetBeans 3.6 and 4.0.
Mevenide for the upcoming 4.0 version contains these features .

You can download the 0.4 release. It was tested with Maven 1.0.1 and Netbeans IDE 4.0 RC1. Reasonable effort is made to have it always working with the latest development builds of Netbeans 4.0. Please note that the grammar module (completion for maven xml files) for 0.4 release will work with the RC1 but not with the old beta2. You are encouraged to upgrade. To get the latest Netbeans builds, go to the download page
You can download the snapshot release of Mevenide for Netbeans 3.x.
NOTE: Development of Mevenide for NetBeans 3.6 has been stoppped and the downloaded codebase is not production ready. Further development is going on for NB 4.0.
